__e: If you're not back soon, we will tear down the walls to find you.
We didn't because our common suffering and love for each other kept us together.
So many young people- what do you know of suffering and death?
The suffering which has been in this country so long denied.
What would he do had he the motive and the cue for passion that I have?
You'd think after all the suffering I've seen, I'd get used to it. He and I had arranged a meeting this morning.
You don't understand what true suffering is.
What if all I have is my suffering?
It looks like misery's all you got.
